# Importing Data Set

Data source: [TUIK](https://data.tuik.gov.tr/)

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| output: false
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/melih/Documents/GitHub/emu430-fall2024-team-cousin_analytics/data/bina_kat_yas.xlsx")
save(data, file = "cousinanalytics.RData")
```

Download the data set (Building_Ages_FloorNumbers) : [cousinanalytics.RData](https://github.com/emu-hacettepe-analytics/emu430-fall2024-team-cousin_analytics/raw/master/cousinanalytics.RData)
